swiftsolutions.taskscheduler.branchandboundastar

Class BBAAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • swiftsolutions.taskscheduler.branchandboundastar.BBAAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm

    public class BBAAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
implements Algorithm
    A class containing the BBA* algorithm, blacked boxed in primitive types.

      • BBA

        private void BBA(int previousTask,
                 int previousProcessor,
                 int numFreeTasks,
                 int depth,
                 int[] procEndTimes,
                 int[][] tasks,
                 int[][] s,
                 int idleTime)
        This is the main method that creates the schedules implemented using the pseudo code of BBA*.
        Parameters:
        previousTask - The previous task which was scheduled
        previousProcessor - The previous processor which task was scheduled
        numFreeTasks - The previous number of available tasks
        depth - The current recursive depth

      • FTO

        private void FTO(int[] orderedTasks,
                 int index,
                 int[] procEndTimes,
                 int[][] tasks,
                 int[][] s,
                 int idleTime)
        Recursive Ordering for FTO, AllIndependence and InitialBound.
        Parameters:
        orderedTasks - A primitive priority queue off ordered tasks
        procEndTimes - Index pointing to element in the priority queue for current state
        tasks - Reference to the map of tasks
        s - The current schedule
        idleTime - The cumulative idle time

        Method to make a copy of a schedule.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A copy of the schedule

        private int[][] copyTasks(int[][] tasks)
        Method to make a copy of tasks.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A copy of the tasks map

      • getBottomLevels

        private void getBottomLevels(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> nodes,
                             int currentBottomLevel)
        Recursive function that updates the bottom levels of the nodes in the input set and all the nodes of that parent.
        Parameters:
        nodes - The set of tasks
        currentBottomLevel - The current bottom level calculated

      • cost

        private int cost(int[][] s,
                 int[] procEndTimes,
                 int taskID,
                 int dataReadyTime,
                 int idleTime)
        Based off the cost function f described where f = max{Initial(s), idle-time(s), bottom-level(s), DRT(s)}.
        Parameters:
        s - The current complete schedule
        procEndTimes - The completed processor end times
        taskID - The last task to be scheduled
        dataReadyTime - Communication delay from parents offsets
        idleTime - The cumulative idle time
        Returns:
        The total cost of the input schedule

      • free

        private int[] free(int[][] s,
                   int[][] tasks)
        This method takes in a schedule and returns an array of free tasks which are tasks that are not already scheduled and there parents have all been scheduled.
        Parameters:
        s - The current schedule
        tasks - The map of tasks relationships
        Returns:
        The current list of available tasks

      • convertTasks

        private void convertTasks()
        This method is used to convertTasks the task map passed into execute() into the arrays used to map the data in this class

      • convertSchedule

        private Schedule convertSchedule(int[][] schedule)
        Convert the final 2D array schedule back into a schedule that is to be returned be the execute method.
        Parameters:
        schedule - The current schedule outputted by the algorithm
        Returns:
        The converted Schedule object for output parser

      • getFirstEmptyProc

        private int getFirstEmptyProc(int[] procEndTimes)
        Find the first empty processor from the processor end times.
        Parameters:
        procEndTimes - Contains the finishing time of each processor at current state of algorithm
        Returns:
        The id of the first empty processor

      • isAllIndependent

        private int[] isAllIndependent(int[] freeTasks)
        Checks if all the available tasks are independent from each other.
        Parameters:
        freeTasks - The list of available tasks at current iteration of the algorithm
        Returns:
        true if the available tasks are all independent, else false

      • isFTO

        private int[] isFTO(int[] freeTasks,
                    int[][] s,
                    int numFreeTasks)
        Checks if the available tasks can be scheduled in a fixed order.
        Parameters:
        freeTasks - The list of available tasks at the current iteration of the algorithm
        s - The current schedule
        Returns:
        true if the available tasks can be order it FTO, else false

      • nodeEquivalence

        private void nodeEquivalence(int taskA,
                             int taskB)
        Pre-processing of the algorithm to mark all tasks which are equivalent to each other, same parent, child, weight and also communication costs.
        Parameters:
        taskA - Task A
        taskB - Task B
